title: Username Authentication Requirements - Phase 1
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Authentication can take place over http or https. Use an MCP config flag for `protocol` that can take `HTTP` or `HTTPS` as an argument.

Allow for ENV variables of JELLYFIN_USERNAME and JELLYFIN_PASSWORD for authentication. If not found use the authentication prompt tool.
